title: A log of all the unique users we know to have ever requested
the backend server
description: Describes known users of the service (not visitors)

all_users.description: the top-level list of user objects.

unique_id.description: unique 'name' for the user identified here

gapi_info.description: (can be empty) a GAPI identity object

time_first_conn.description: time of the user's first known connection

time_last_conn.description: time of the user's last known connection

count_conns.description: total number of connections to the API

count_orders.description: total number of orders ever placed

count_menu_upd8s.description: total number of times the user updated the menu

count_signins.description: total number of GAPI signins by the user
